Home.title: testin'
Home.introOne: I'm an artist, aspiring game designer, and graduate student at Kyushu University. I develop games, shoot film, and compose music in my spare time. I've created games for companies and taught an AI to write a movie (before it was cool)!
Home.introTwo: I'm currently researching games accessibility tech for the visually impaired—designing tools to streamline accessibility development. In my free time I design my own game concepts, and occasionally find the time to develop prototypes. Check out my work for more details.

Tenjin.title: Tenjin Dash
Tenjin.desc: You are the controller in this high-octane race through the streets of Tenjin! Inspired by exercise-oriented game design of World Class Track Meet andWii Fit.

EnemyZero.title: Enemy Zero
EnemyZero.desc: A proof-of-concept VR remake of WARP's cult classic horror game Enemy Zero!

Beauty.title: Beauty
Beauty.desc: A globetrotting adventure exploring the myths and legends of world culture. Inspired by 2D action-adventure classics (Zelda, Mana) and modern narrative masterpieces (Brothers: A Tale of Two Sons), presented in the style of a BL romance.
